summary: All previously-blocking issues were addressed with explicit gating checks, type/caller updates, CI/schema dependency coverage, and corrected merge-conflict acceptance criteria, with no new truly blocking problems introduced.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Migration 056 amendment risk: missing gating to ensure itâ€™s safe to amend an existing migration
previous_issues_status.notes: Task 1.2 now includes an explicit gating check against main and a fallback plan to create a new migration (058) with a rebuild if 056 has shipped, plus ACs for fresh migrate-from-zero and an insert using entry_type='transfer_in'.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Migration 057 amendment risk + handling existing rows that might violate stricter CHECK
previous_issues_status.notes: Task 1.3 adds the same gating check and explicitly states the fallback: create a forward migration that handles existing data before adding the stricter CHECK. ACs include representative inserts and a full lifecycle flow that would have failed if the constraint were wrong.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: ReconciliationService Check 5 error handling: return shape/type/callers/tests not updated for {status:'failed', error} and removal of {skipped:true}
previous_issues_status.notes: Task 2.1 explicitly includes updating the report type/interface and downstream callers/tests, plus an AC that no references to { skipped: true } remain and TS compiles after the type change.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: EntryType + DB CHECK dependency: service writes 'transfer_in' but CI/test DB might not have updated CHECK constraint
previous_issues_status.notes: Task 2.2 now includes an explicit requirement/AC that the test harness migrates from a clean DB (no cached schema) and that the integration test passes with the updated CHECK accepting 'transfer_in'. Task 1.2 also includes fresh migrate-from-zero AC.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Merge conflict task AC contradictory/unverifiable ("merge completes without conflicts" and reliance on GitHub PR state)
previous_issues_status.notes: Task 3.5 AC is now locally testable: merge completes with conflicts resolved/committed if any, clean working tree, tests pass, diff reviewed; PR mergeability is explicitly optional/manual.
